about_the_game:
Have you ever thought about soaring to divine heights? Becoming stronger than anyone else? Arlo already has, but he couldn't do it alone. Help him regain his memories and power so he can protect the world!



Fight with monsters
Encounter a variety of fearsome creatures, each with unique strengths and weaknesses, as you traverse treacherous landscapes. Employ strategic combat techniques, unleash powerful spells or attacks, and utilize specialized equipment to defeat monsters and claim victory

Build your base
Expand your base over time, adding workshops, gardens, and other functional areas that enhance your survival capabilities, provide storage for resources, and attract NPCs who can offer questsor trade.

Make your own tools
Explore the world to gather raw materials such as ore, wood, and gems, and then utilize a forge or workbench to shape them into useful implements. By mastering the blacksmithing skill, you can create sturdy weapons that deal devastating damage, durable armor that provides superior protection, and various tools that aid in exploration and resource gathering.

Enchant with magic
Harnessing magic allows you to manipulate the environment, solve puzzles, and engage in intense battles with supernatural creatures.

name: Arlo's Ascension
short_description: Arlo' Ascension is a single-player action RPG. Deprived of your strength and memories, you must fight the evil that threatens the world. Crafting, blacksmithing, and magic are at your disposal. Do whatever it takes to reclaim everything.
